new.cdef.description: Define a component that can contain any number of source code files, pre-compiled binary files and resource files.

bundles.description: List additional files or directories to be copied from the build host into the app so theyâ€™re available to the app at runtime.

file.description: Declare the specific files located on the target outside of the app, but made accessible to the app.

dir.description: Specify directories on target device to make accessible to the app.

cflags.description: Specify command-line arguments to pass to the compiler when compiling C source code files.

cxxflags.description: Specify command-line arguments to pass to the compiler when compiling C++ source code files.

externalBuild.description: Specify commands required to build this component using an external build process.

ldflags.description: Specify command-line arguments to pass to the compiler when linking C/C++ object (.o) files together into a component shared library (.so) file.

pools.description: Specify the number of memory pool blocks that each memory pool should contain.

provides.description: List things this component provides (exports) to other software either inside or outside of the app.

headerDir.description: Declare the path to header file

lib.description: List the libraries provided by the component.

requires.description: Specify things the component needs from its runtime environment.

api.description: List IPC APIs used by this component.

device.description: Declare the device files that reside on the target outside of the app, but made accessible to the app.

component.description: Declare this component depends on another component.

kernelModules.description: Declare the component dependencies on kernel modules.

javaPackage.description: List Java packages to build when creating a Java based component.

sources.description: Contain a list of source code files.
